thread.title: Trump: Obama Is Behind Protests and “Possibly” Leaks
thread.title_full: Trump: Obama Is Behind Protests and “Possibly” Leaks

author: Davis
title: Trump: Obama Is Behind Protests and “Possibly” Leaks
text:
Trump Can’t Help But Smile After Crowd Begins Chanting “USA” 
Obama’s organization Organizing for Action has been shown to be behind some of these protests , but so far there hasn’t been any proof that Obama himself has directed them. 
“You never know what’s exactly happening behind the scenes,” Trump explained. “You know you’re probably right or possibly right. You never know. I think President Obama is behind it because his people are certainly behind it. And some of the leaks possibly come from that group.” 
“You know, some of the leaks, which are very serious leaks because they’re very bad in terms of national security — but I also understand that’s politics. And in terms of him being behind things, that’s politics, and it will probably continue,” he added.   
You can watch his full remarks here: 
It really wouldn’t surprise anyone if Obama was behind some of these leaks and protests . It is almost certainly some of his people who are still working in the federal government who are leaking everything they can get their hands on in an effort to hurt this administration. 
Instead of letting Trump get his footing in the federal government, Obama and his goons are most likely trying to sabotage his presidency because they are bitter that former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton lost in the 2016 presidential election.
